rules.name: Assign_Opportunity_Decision
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 5) AND (3 OR 4 OR ((10 OR 11 OR 12) AND 13)) AND ((6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 9)

fields.name: Information_Display_1
fields.fieldText: * Please ensure there is an existing Product Insight for this Initiative in order to create a new Opportunity.

fields.name: Product_Insights
fields.fieldText: Select the Product Insights to add to the Opportunity

fields.name: Error_On_No_Selection
fields.fieldText: Please select at least one Product Insight in order to create an Opportunity related to this Initiative.﻿

fields.name: Help_Text
fields.fieldText: * ﻿Campaign Products which already have Product Insights on this opportunity are not shown here.

fields.name: NoRecordsFoundText
fields.fieldText: No Product Insights were found for this Initiative.

fields.name: Account_Verification_DT
fields.fieldText: Please ensure the account with which this opportunity is associated is verified before moving into Negotiating.

fields.name: Close_Date_Validation
fields.fieldText: The Close Date cannot be a date in the past.

fields.name: Opportunity_Creation_Error_On_Stage
fields.fieldText: Please create the opportunity in the Prospecting or Pitching stage and provide updates from there.

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7)
